EmailInvalid: Email must be a valid email address
PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
PasswordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number and one special character
PasswordMismatch: Password and confirm password do not match
FirstNameMaxLength: First name must not exceed 100 characters
LastNameMaxLength: Last name must not exceed 100 characters
RefreshTokenMinLength: Refresh token must be at least 10 characters long
RefreshTokenInvalid: Refresh token is invalid or expired
InsufficientPermissions: Insufficient permissions to perform this action
